casebody.data:
Monday, January 11, 1999

MOTION DOCKET

97-2039. E. Canton Edn. Assn. v. McIntosh.

Stark App. No. 96CA0293. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Stark County. Upon consideration of appellants’ motion for enlargement of time allocated for oral argument,

IT IS ORDERED by court that the motion be, and hereby is, granted, to the extent that oral argument is extended to twenty minutes per side.
